telegram_bot.description: Developed in Python using aiogram, aiogram_dialog, fluentogram, and SQLAlchemy for interaction via Telegram.

self_hosting.title: Self-Hosted IT Infrastructure
self_hosting.description: Assembled and configured my own server, including:
self_hosting.p5: Setting up GitLab for development and support of personal projects
self_hosting.p6: Data storage organization with Nextcloud and mail through mailcow
self_hosting.p8: Installation and configuration of OpenWrt on the router with a firewall and WireGuard for secure SSH access to the infrastructure from outside

telegram_bots_course.title: Telegram Bots in Python: Advanced Level

profile_achievements.title: Profile Achievements
profile_achievements.description: Prize winner at the 42nd International Conference 'School Informatics and Sustainable Development Issues'

sports_achievements.title: Sports Achievements
sports_achievements.p1: 1st place, 3 second places, and 4 third places in bench press without equipment and Russian bench press at national and international levels.
sports_achievements.p2: Participation in WRPF World Cups in 2023 and 2024 and the World Championship of the Russian Bench Press Federation in 2023.
sports_achievements.p3: Member of international powerlifting federations WRPF and IPL, as well as the Russian Bench Press Federation.
sports_achievements.p4: Record holder in Leningrad Oblast in bench press without equipment WRPF.
